statement.text: You think I wear this outfit for the fun of it? Yes, I'm a real nurse. I was at work when the world went to shit.
statement.ref_text: You think I wear this outfit for the fun of it? Yes, I'm a real nurse. I was at work when the world went to shit.

statement.text: I worked with a group of first responders. We got a call to the skate park because there was some kids getting sick. We got there, and it was a shit show. All the kids there were sick, and throwing up.
statement.ref_text: I worked with a group of first responders. We got a call to the skate park because there was some kids getting sick. We got there, and it was a shit show. All the kids there were sick, and throwing up.

statement.text: We didn't know at first. We thought it might have been a gas leak, so we called in support from the bio-lab. They came in their hazmat suits, but by the time they arrived, it was too late.
statement.ref_text: We didn't know at first. We thought it might have been a gas leak, so we called in support from the bio-lab. They came in their hazmat suits, but by the time they arrived, it was too late.

statement.text: The lab workers didn't detect any gas leak, so they cleared the area for us to go get the bodies. That's when things got really bad.
statement.ref_text: The lab workers didn't detect any gas leak, so they cleared the area for us to go get the bodies. That's when things got really bad.

statement.text: The kids started to get up, growling and snarling at us. I ran back to the van, but I was the only one who made it...
statement.ref_text: The kids started to get up, growling and snarling at us. I ran back to the van, but I was the only one who made it...

statement.text: I hid in the van for hours, hearing them snarl and growl. I must have fallen asleep; when I woke up, it was all quiet. I woke up to this new hell.
statement.ref_text: I hid in the van for hours, hearing them snarl and growl. I must have fallen asleep; when I woke up, it was all quiet. I woke up to this new hell.

statement.text: Sorry doesn't make it go away. But thanks for listening.
statement.ref_text: Sorry doesn't make it go away. But thanks for listening.

statement.text: You must have gotten hit in the head pretty hard, if you don't remember a lot. Sounds like a touch of amnesia.
statement.ref_text: You must have gotten hit in the head pretty hard, if you don't remember a lot. Sounds like a touch of amnesia.

statement.text: Amnesia is the fancy word for losing your memory. It can happen if you get hit in the head, if you've gotten a fever, or a few other causes.
statement.ref_text: Amnesia is the fancy word for losing your memory. It can happen if you get hit in the head, if you've gotten a fever, or a few other causes.

statement.text: It's hard to say. I'm not a doctor, so it's not really area. It might get better over time. You'll just have to have some patience.
statement.ref_text: It's hard to say. I'm not a doctor, so it's not really area. It might get better over time. You'll just have to have some patience.

statement.text: What the hell? I don't give a shit about you believe. I'm done with you.
statement.ref_text: What the hell? I don't give a shit about you believe. I'm done with you.

statement.text: I can understand that. We are all stressed. You don't see us taking it out on others though.
statement.ref_text: I can understand that. We are all stressed. You don't see us taking it out on others though.

statement.text: Poison people?! What the hell is your problem?
statement.ref_text: Poison people?! What the hell is your problem?

response_entry.ref_text: I know a liar when I see one.

response.text: I know a liar when I see one.
response.ref_text: I know a liar when I see one.
